tool_description: API Showing Real time Climate Change News from the American media.
name: US Climate Change Now
title: US Climate Change Now

api_list.name: Climate Change News from individual sources.
api_list.description: Get data from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-climate-change-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Current US Media Climate Change News
api_list.description: Endpoint returns all current climate change news from all sources.
